name: HH_OASIS_SNAPSHOT_STAT_HX
description: This table stores the history of the status of a data set.

columns.name: OASIS_SET_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the data set record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREV_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item tracks the initial value of LHO 105 in a status change action.

columns.name: NEW_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item tracks the value of LHO 105 after a status change action.

columns.name: STAT_CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item contains a link to the EMP record of the user associated with the status change action.

columns.name: STAT_CHANGE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: CHANGE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: This item houses the instant associated with the status change action.

columns.name: STAT_CHANGE_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the HNO of the comment added and relevant audit information.
